website_summaries.verdict: Nice spikeless golf shoe that will give you a great level of performance and comfort.
pros: Carries a lower price point than expected for a golf shoe
Model of shoe is available in multiple color combinations
With a spikeless shoe, you'll be able to wear these shoes on or off the course
cons: Not as comfortable as some other models
Feet can become hot in these shoes

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable shoes. I was using Footjoy's M Project Spikeless shoes and loved them, but kinda wore those out. These fit almost exactly the same size (13's in both). I have used them about 4 - 5 times so far and they fit well and provide nice traction. I live in Louisiana and they are not too hot. On the lighter side as far as weight goes. I plan on buying another pair and will use these as my shoes for the next year or so. I recommend them as a great hybrid - spikeless golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are really good. Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are really good. Better than expected, given the price. With a padded golf sock, the fit is exact. The shoe is waterproof. You can spend more for a shoe but won't buy a better shoe than this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bretz

customer_reviews.title: ... but after wearing for 2-hours seemed to be just fine. Haven't tried in heavy due in the AM ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the shoes were too small but after wearing for 2-hours seemed to be just fine. Haven't tried in heavy due in the AM for water proofing. It is a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ray hurst

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size 9 and I ordered a size 8.5 and they are still a tad large on me. Suggest getting a size to 1/2 a size smaller than what you are used to. Pro: Walked 18 holes 4x with these shoes and I have no complaints, they are very comfortable. Con: Look kind of cheap
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for my narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews, I ordered this shoe because several people said it was a little on the narrow side, which is perfect for me. It seems to be well made. They came with an extra set of laces. One gray and one orange to match the stitching. They've kept my feet dry in heavy dew, but I haven't worn them in rain yet.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: PUMA Mens Ignite Golf Shoes:  Excellent Quality, Fit and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit, comfortable and excellent quality...during a few rounds, sloshed through more than a few puddles and encountered a few Hawaii downpours without any leaks. Low maintenance, easy to clean and still look new.
customer_reviews.author: T-ITUP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: GREAT golf shoe!! VERY comfortable out of the box and on course traction is excellent. Have played in some very wet conditions and so far so good on keeping my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Larry N.

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to ignite...your feet, that is.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, and they are great for non-slipping spikeless shoes. Only one problem... They have ZERO ventilation. Ignite is a fitting name for these shoes. Your feet will be hotter than a jalapeno festival in the middle of the Mexico desert in July. If you go out and walk 9 holes in cool weather you will come back with soaking wet socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size down as much as one full size.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely size down. I'm usually between an 8.5 and 9. Ordered an 8.5 after reading reviews and they were still too big. Exchanged them for an 8 and they're still a bit roomy in the toe. The shoe is a bit narrow but the toe box is wider than Adidas or Nike I've tried on. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fit snug in the widest part area of foot.
customer_reviews.text: Hi..love the look but fit tight in width. I usually ride but walk 9 hole course. My feet hurt. I dont have wide feet. I have shoe stretchers and I put a large sock in it slightly wet until dry.. It has helped. I have the monolites too and they fit perfect. Great price here ..in fact lowest i could find..and they will be fine when I finish stretching them...otherwise 5 stars. If you have never worn spikeless..they work great and you can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pollock

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a sceptic of spikeless golf shoes for a while now. I finally broke down and bought a pair. I bought this pair at a great deal, and I couldn't be happier. Easily the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever put on. Stylish enough to wear everyday. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fit well
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fit well. Not much break in period. My only gripe is that it seems to run a little longer than normal. Probably a half size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I went down a whole size
customer_reviews.text: I walk when I play golf, and I love these shoes. I normally wear a 12. These are an 11 and are still a little roomy, but very comfortable. I tried them on first in a retail golf store. They were cheaper on Amazon. I've played 3 rounds in these and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: e=mc2

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and nice looking (professional like dress shoes) pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice looking (professional like dress shoes) pair of golf shoes. But usually, wear 9.5 but ended up with size 9 in these as they ran a little larger for me compared to other shoes such as regular Nike sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Yang

customer_reviews.title: Puma Ignite-great golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent golf shoes. I had a pair of white ones for summer and liked them so much I bought both brown and black for winter golf. The are very comfortable. I wore both pair on the golf course right out of the box. I get compliments on them. Love that there are so many color choices. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes altho they tend to be on the warm on a hot day. The first day I used the shoes it was 90 degrees. After 18 holes I needed to get back into my sandals. But I still like the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn it as yet. However I already have similar shoe. Very comfortable. slightly large. I wear size 9 M. I got 1/2 size smaller in this case. Overall my experience is very good that is way I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: TSA

customer_reviews.title: ok for sitting in house
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had not bought this shoe...as a golf-shoe, it is terrible. It is comfortable but offers no lateral support and the low heel is part of a bad design.
customer_reviews.author: TD Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure to order a FULL SIZE down
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable. Just make sure you order a full size down. I normally wear a 9, and an 8 fits me perfectly in this shoe. I've never seen an athletic shoe this far off in sizing... other than that the shoe is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Truly waterproof that keep foot dry. Genuine leather is the plus. Hope it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Chin W. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, I walk a pretty flat course but it does have some small hills and these are very nice shoes to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: ed davenport

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - comfortable with support and I love the look
customer_reviews.author: steve schwaid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes. Very confortable. Great looking. Spikeless sole holds up very well. They fit a little large. Great quality leather and good looking colors. By the way, forest is kind of green, not gray, as someone answered another question. Highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Golf Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of some new golf shoes and already owned Puma Ignite running shoes (which I love). These shoes are super comfortable and require no break in at all. They grip the turf well and look sharp. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Juan

customer_reviews.title: ... the shoe in warmer weather and it’s held up fine. Not sure how they would hold up in ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the shoe in warmer weather and it’s held up fine. Not sure how they would hold up in wetter conditions but grip has not been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Vic and Millie

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I have ever had plus it is waterproof which helps when you walk through the rough frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe...runs a little big?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful golf shoe. Classic look. Compliments from golf partners. As is usual with Puma...I feel that I could have gone a 0.5 size smaller. But...I could be picky.
customer_reviews.author: Kaukev

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I own. Play twice a week without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the shoe would have more flexibility. Not unhappy with the feel, but different than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Comfy out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 wearing but comfy right away. Good fit. Would be 5 stars but color not as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Covert

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and broke in quickly. Grip well on the course. Be careful on wet floors though...tend to slide a little.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable. A little narrow in the
customer_reviews.text: Just played 18 and no issues. very comfortable. A little narrow in the toes
customer_reviews.author: Russell D. Smoldon

customer_reviews.title: Size of the shoe in wrong
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking shoes but does not as comfortable as I like, real problem it's too late to send back, stuck with you that doesn't fit correctly
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable golf shoes I have owned. Look good, feel good and great traction.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit fine But the shoe it self is about 1,1/2 inches longer than normal golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Better off with a more expensive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not up to my standards. Better off buying the more expensive golf shoe. Not a good comfortable fit
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: they feel comfortable in house, i have not used them on the course
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Doug

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Super comfy, and waterproof. Fit exactly as I expected. Very durable, too...
customer_reviews.author: DanaCz

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit like other Puma's I've had
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awful. They do not fit like other Puma's I've had, they are way bigger then a normal size. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them twice, but found them to be extremely comfortable and stylish. Definitely will purchase the Puma again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good shoes < I like very thing about this shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: very good shoes < I like very thing about this shoes looking for brown but can't find one with same price too bad
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Mascardo

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Wore them for the first time last ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Wore them for the first time last week.. More comfortable then I thought they would be.. Felt like I only had socks on and no shoes. One of the best purchases I have made. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic golf shoe. Super comfortable and great style and snagged them at a great price. Most of my golf shoes are footjoys and these fit similarly to them.
customer_reviews.author: prbaty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great! Seem to fit well. Unfortunately been too busy to use them yet, but look forward to it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable pair of golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable pair of golf shoes. No need to break them in like most golf shoes. I have these shoes in three colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit, comfort and style! Everything you want in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit, comfort and style! Everything you want in a shoe! You can wear them all day for work or play!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit as advertised, great shoe, I walk 36-72 holes a week, feet fell great.
customer_reviews.author: rick buchser

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok but strt to lose its colour too early
customer_reviews.author: Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! Fit perfect, comfortable, stylish and is a great golf show!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great styling and price
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, great styling and economical price. They're so stylish, I'd like to use them as everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Hardey

customer_reviews.title: Puma Golf Shoes Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great Golf Shoe, fits perfectly!!! Buying more and more Puma Apparel. Awesome Job PUMA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: They run large
customer_reviews.text: Order a whole size down. I wear 11.5 in all other shoes I own and had to return and get 10.5 and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Like heel spurs
customer_reviews.text: Too little support, and I'm getting foot pain from them. Like heel spurs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf shoe. Fits exactly as I hoped it would. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David M Melcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoe, ignite foam does tend to get soiled easy but cleans up without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Look
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved this gift! perfect fit and looks very sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable!! Would buy them again. Never disappointed in puma shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I expected and I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Re-ordered a new pair a half a size smaller very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Gilley

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOKING GOLF SHOE
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 13 in puma shoes but had to get a 12 in the ignites. They fit more like footjoys but a bit on the narrow side.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Sickler

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent golf shoes , great fit out of the box. Strongly recommended
customer_reviews.author: 333skiway

customer_reviews.title: and offer great support on the course
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfy, look fly, and offer great support on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but not for wide feet. I had to return them because I need wide or extra wide, but they looked sharp and were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Could use better arch support
customer_reviews.text: Could use better arch support. Other then that, very happy. Perfect shoe to wear from teaching at the gym to teaching at the college;)
customer_reviews.author: Conny Foremes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Great performance.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and looks great. I should be in a 10 not a 10.5 but didn't want to be without them waiting for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: M R A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my boyfriends father and he loves them. Bought 10.5 which he usually wears in most other golf brands and they fit perfectly. Great pair of golf shoes for price and for any age
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: Look great can't wait
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great still snowing here so can't wait to use them
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL TIRRELL

customer_reviews.title: The shoes din't fit. One shoe was smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes din't fit . One shoe was smaller than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Mills

customer_reviews.title: Fore!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the first day. Good grip and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Ignite Spikeless Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
On and off course, the ignite spikeless will complement your active lifestyle. Designed with a modern silhouette and inspired from classic golf footwear using a combination of sporty and premium materials, this functional golf shoe takes your game to a new level.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Spikeless gold shoe featuring sporty lateral overlays and oxford-inspired toe and lacing
IGNITE proprietary energy-return foam for responsive stability
